name: maranga-berry
effect: Held: When the holder is hit by a special move, increases its Special Defense by one stage.
short_effect: Held: When the holder is hit by a special move, increases its Special Defense by one stage.

flavor_text_entries.x-y:
If held by a Pokémon, this Berry will
increase the holder’s Sp. Def
if it’s hit with a special move.
flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
If held by a Pokémon, this Berry will increase the
holder’s Sp. Def if it’s hit with a special move.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
If held by a Pokémon, this Berry will increase the
holder’s Sp. Def if it’s hit with a special move.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
If held by a Pokémon, this Berry will increase the
holder’s Sp. Def if it’s hit with a special move.
flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
If held by a Pokémon, this Berry will increase the
holder’s Sp. Def if it’s hit with a special move.

fling_effect: Immediately activates the berry's effect on the target.
